author: hgomez
msg: APR could be built WITHOUT pthread support, ie FreeBSD

author: hgomez
msg: Make sure that apxs flags will be passed to libtool when building
mod_jk.c (if not mod_jk.c will not be compiled with -DEAPI for example)

author: hgomez
msg: Correct preprocessor use of APR_HAS_THREADS, since APR
make use of #define APR_HAS_THREADS 0 when no threads support

author: costin
msg: Changed the default to include only the socket and base modules.
For anything else you must explicitely edit jk2.properties.
The reason for the change - many people seem confused about the
messages about jni.so library, and this require additional actions
Also replaced some printlns with log.

author: costin
msg: Added the host attribute - since MX4J now defaults to localhost.
